title: Environmental Literacy Project Learning Reflecting Islamic Values

context.prior_knowledge: Basic awareness of Islamic values and general recognition of environmental issues
context.additional_context: Asynchronous digital instruction integrated with language subjects, performing projects that combine Islamic practices and environmental conservation themes

learning_goals: Students can develop an environmental protection project plan reflecting Islamic values based on four sub-themes (water conservation, soil protection, use of eco-friendly products, and waste recycling).
Learners can propose solutions applicable in real-life situations by integrating scientific inquiry skills and environmental literacy through PBL activities.
Participating students can produce and present team-based project outcomes through online collaboration, incorporating continuous feedback via formative assessment.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
